name: Sahuagin Coral Smasher

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: The coral smasher has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
text: The coral smasher can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

trait.name: Shark Telepathy
text: The coral smasher can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

trait.name: Siege Monster
text: The coral smasher deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The coral smasher makes two attacks with its warhammer, or one attack with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Warhammer
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

description:
Employed as frontline brutes in The Final Enemy, coral smashers are drawn from the ranks of the strongest sahuagin warriors. Their physical strength overcomes the resistance of the water as they swing their hammers at structures and foes with equal zeal.
Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 249
